channel.title: Coding For Mods And Admins On Moparscape?
channel.description: im so confused can any one help me, im pretty new so step by step would be nice,

item.title: Coding For Mods And Admins On Moparscape?
item.dc:creator: @sic_pure sic pure
item.description:
@sic_pure wrote:

AshtonB:

i go on hybridscape, then on to characters and then click my character and changed characters rights to 3 and still nothing comes up when i log in i even changed it to 2 and 1 but still nothing

hybridscape doesn’t show that, get a freaking server

Read full topic

item.source: Coding For Mods And Admins On Moparscape?

item.title: Coding For Mods And Admins On Moparscape?
item.dc:creator: @im_hard im hard
item.description:
@im_hard wrote:

Open the file chars.

Find the name u want to change then u should see soemthing like this

[CHARACTER] character-height = 0 character-posx = 3252 character-posy = 3435 character-rights = 0 character-ismember = 1 character-messages = 0 character-lastconnection = YOUSIF character-lastlogin = 20070524 character-energy = 58 character-gametime = 0 character-gamecount = 4764

Change the player rights to 0 - normal 1 - mod 2 - admin 3 - owner so then u should see something like this

[CHARACTER] character-height = 0 character-posx = 3252 character-posy = 3435 character-rights = 2 character-ismember = 1 character-messages = 0 character-lastconnection = YOUSIF character-lastlogin = 20070524 character-energy = 58 character-gametime = 0 character-gamecount = 4764

Then save and exit.

(btw dont make spamming polls).

P.S. If u are using hyperbirdscape this will not work, u have to have a running sorce. u can downlaod from download section.

Read full topic
item.source: Coding For Mods And Admins On Moparscape?

item.title: Coding For Mods And Admins On Moparscape?
item.dc:creator: @Jonna Jonna
item.description:
@Jonna wrote:

0= Member
1= Mod
2= Admin
3= Owner

Click on the chara’s name in the folder characters.

You should then see sentance called characters rights= 0

Change the 0 to what u want.

Read full topic
